description: This file defines the ReservationsPage widget for a Flutter app, managing reservation listings, UI elements for creating new reservations, and related dialogs. It utilizes provider for state management and includes UI components such as headers, list tiles, and forms for reservation input.

classes.name: ReservationsPage
classes.description: Stateless widget representing the reservations list page with functionality to create, display, and cancel reservations.

classes.name: _ReservationDialog
classes.description: Stateful widget presenting a dialog for creating a new reservation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for ReservationsPage, displaying reservations or an empty state.

methods.name: _resStatusChip
methods.description: Returns a chip widget indicating the reservation status.

methods.name: _fmtDate
methods.description: Formats DateTime objects into a readable string for display.

methods.name: _openNewReservation
methods.description: Displays a dialog to create a new reservation.

methods.name: _pickDateTime
methods.description: Allows the user to pick a date and time for a reservation.
